featured.text: Then in the Victorian era (19th century), weaving companies began to systematically record and formalize the system of setts for commercial purposes.

definition.zh_def: 維多利亞時代的，指英國女王維多利亞統治期間的風格或特徵。
definition.en_def: Relating to the period of Queen Victoria's reign in Britain (1837-1901) or its distinctive style and characteristics.
definition.example: The Victorian architecture in the city is known for its elaborate details and grandeur.
